title: Annaâ€™s London Adventure
story: Anna has always dreamed of visiting London.
Last July, her dream finally came true when she traveled there with her parents.
They stayed in a small hotel near Hyde Park and spent five days exploring the city.
On the first day, they visited the British Museum and had lunch at a traditional pub.
The next day, they walked across Tower Bridge and took a boat ride on the River Thames.
Anna has taken over 300 photos and posted many of them online.
She has also written a detailed blog post about each day of the trip.
Since she came back home, she has told her friends stories about London every single day.
She says it was one of the most exciting experiences of her life.

fill_in_the_blank.sentence: Anna ___ (dream) of visiting London since she was a child.
They ___ (walk) across Tower Bridge the next day.

questions.question: Where did Anna stay during her trip?
questions.answer: In a small hotel near Hyde Park

questions.question: How long did they stay in London?
What did they do on the second day?
questions.answer: They walked across Tower Bridge and took a boat ride

questions.question: Why does Anna say the trip was exciting?
questions.answer: Because it was one of the most exciting experiences of her life

They stayed in a hotel near Hyde Park.
She has written a blog post about the trip.
